text: I believe it is peace in our time.
author: Neville Chamberlain

text: I hope for peace and sanity - it's the same thing.
author: Studs Terkel

text: Peace is a natural effect of trade.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

text: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others.
author: Peace Pilgrim

text: After all, I long to be in America again, nay, if I can go home to return no more to Europe, it seems to me that I shall ever enjoy more peace of mind, and even Physical comfort than I can meet with in any portion of the world beside.
author: John James Audubon
